# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

set(pytests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/parallel/examples/local_distance.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/parallel/examples/tasks.py)

foreach (test ${pytests})
 GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
 add_test("parallel.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/imppy.sh "python" ${test})
 set_tests_properties("parallel.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "parallel;example")
  #add_dependencies(${name} RMFPython)
endforeach(test)

set(cpp_tests )

foreach (test ${cpp_tests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
   add_executable("parallel.${name}" ${test})
   target_link_libraries("parallel.${name}"     imp_parallel
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.GRAPH_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${CGAL_LIBRARIES} ${ANN_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties("parallel.${name}" PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/parallel/"
                         OUTPUT_NAME "${name}")
   add_test("parallel.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/imppy.sh "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/parallel/${name}")
   set_tests_properties("parallel.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "parallel;example")
   set(executables ${executables} "parallel.${name}")
endforeach(test)

add_custom_target("imp_parallel_examples" ALL DEPENDS ${executables})
